website_summaries.verdict: A decent vacuum pump, but watch out for the oil changes – they're important.
pros: It's efficient if you're using it every now and then
Packs plenty of power and it can be operated for a variety of uses
cons: Look at how the pump uses oil and see if your consumption means that you need oil more frequently

customer_reviews.title: The manufacture ships broken Merchandise
customer_reviews.text: I Received the vacuum pump quickly. The problem is the box was demolished inside the amazon box the pump was missing the oil. Once I bought the oil and then plugged the pump in and the motor did not engage. I contacted the manufacture several times with no response
customer_reviews.author: Raymond L Gray

customer_reviews.title: lasted almost one job
customer_reviews.text: Read a ton of reviews, decided to discount the poor reviews,, Robinair apparently makes red vacuum pumps and blue vacuum pumps. red are made in china blue USA. (did not verify the truth to the blue being USA made) The 15800 I purchase to replace my 30 year old Dayton vacuum pump never completed its first day on the job. something came apart inside and it locked up. long story short, returned the red pump and purchased a pump refresh kit from Grainger and once again my 30 year old pump is back on the job.. your results may vary.
customer_reviews.author: OVERRULED

customer_reviews.title: Good Pump
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pump. I have vacuumed several units with this pump from 5 tons to mini splits. It pulls a vacuum fast. The reason I gave it 4 stars is because you have to be super careful with the oil drain plug. I stripped out my first one of these units by over tightening and it didn't take much to strip out.
customer_reviews.author: Kwelch7

customer_reviews.title: It's still going strong after 3 years, and I haven't even changed the oil yet. Great product for a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: I used this pump in parts with a large chamber to create a vacuum suction to remove the air bubbles outside of the silicone mixture. This pump has easily achieved the 29lbs of mercury that is needed to remove the air from the silicone mixture. It's still going strong after 3 years, and I haven't even changed the oil yet. Great product for a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Evolution Masks

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Purges the AC system super fast. After 5 minutes the gauges were at -30mm (the lowest) and did not budge. Listening to other pumps videos, I can assure you that this pump is very silent. The package came with enough oil for a fill up. There is a claim to change the oil after each use, but if you flushed your AC system with very light evaporating solvent... and let it dry, there is NO oil contamination. Super happy with this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Luke

customer_reviews.title: I used this for maple sugaring for vacuum on my ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this for maple sugaring for vacuum on my releaser 1st year I was getting 27 inchs of vacuum on 180 taps then something happened with the springs inside where the vanes are you cant find replacement vanes for this I toggled it and made it work 5 yrs later it still works but only get 21 inchs of vacuum now thinking about getting another one
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Robinair has been a trusted name in ac equipment for decades. This two stage pump provides "drawdown" power you need to get a good system evac fast. I know from experience it should last for years. I had my first Robinair for more than 10 years. If you do ac work regularly buy this pump with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for surge milker
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my surge milker and it is every bit as hardworking and dependable as my dear cow, Bessie. This is my second Robinair, I've been using the first one almost every day for over a year now and it's still going fine, but I figured I should have a spare just in case.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Works great the first time
customer_reviews.text: It worked great the first time I used it, after that it never seemed to do the job. Unfortunately for me I waited too long to try and get it fixed and I got out of the one year warranty coverage. When I turn the pump on it surges like a car running out of gas and then will do that for quite some time depending on temperature and its mood for the day. Eventually it will get full power but just doesn't work like it did the first time. This is the Chinese model, they said they don't really support them and they don't even bother fixing them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: Good suction for my vacumn chuck for wood turning.
customer_reviews.text: Puchased this product to use with a vacumn check system for wood turning. Excellent suction power!!! Very pleased with the purchase. Not sure if the product is a value for the money since I have never purchased one of these before. For me it works very well to create good vacumn for a vacumn chuck.
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: Great suction but oil vapor from exhaust.
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum pump, used this for vacuum forming, very strong suction and the only issue i have with this unit is oil vapor from the exhaust, it's not much but it's noticeable in my garage after running it a little while. That's the only reason for 4 starts. But otherwise a good unit.
customer_reviews.author: Erfan Jurat

customer_reviews.title: Not good for me
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 of these in the last 2 weeks. The first one came and didn't work. The motor was locked up. The second one came today. Same problem. Not going down this expensive road a third time. I know people have had great luck with these. But so far I've bought 2 and both have not worked.
customer_reviews.author: Kydex holster maker

customer_reviews.title: Good value for cost
customer_reviews.text: Great pump for cost. Bought this to replace a JB 8cfm that fell and was no longer usable. Would recommend for price, a little heavy, but still not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Robinair YES!!
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time, in perfect condition, filled it with oil (supplied) running it on a 21 gal surge tank on a 24x 24 vaccuform table... draws 21 gallons down in 3-4 minutes, a bit smokey, but that's to be expected, and the exhaust port rubber plug can be annoying if you forget to remove it , will launch into orbit!!! lol spent a few times searching for it after launch... all and all GREAT pump, little heavy if your gonna drag it up a ladder...but all good for me.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Good unit but watch out for shipping damage.
customer_reviews.text: First unit arrived broken and had to return it for a replacement. The second unit arrived in good working order. It can pull 29.5Hg but does emit a lot of oil vapor at the exhaust. Much more than other vacuums I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Produces a slightly annoying smoke/vapor so be sure to get an extra long ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with our electric surge belly milker for our home dairy cow...6 months in and she is still going strong. Produces a slightly annoying smoke/vapor so be sure to get an extra long vacuum hose to ensure the exhaust is a good distance from your milking space!
customer_reviews.author: Stitchbug

customer_reviews.title: Time
customer_reviews.text: We now have 2 of these pumps. One is 3 years old and still strong. Good quality, I purchased a second one a few months ago. Both are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Pump  Not what it appears
customer_reviews.text: This pump looks good and looks well built. Fist time using this pump and it lasted three minutes. First came a pop and then the smoke followed. It tripped the circuit breaker. After resetting the breaker the pump would not run. Was told by Robinar that this model was a Cheap China import. Thank Amazon for the fast return and refund. Ordered a Yellow Jacket and had not problem pulling vacuum down to 250 Microns
customer_reviews.author: Bobby C

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pump from Amazon in November, 2014. It has been used three times, the last two of which it will only pull 27". I am sick and tired of spending good money for junk. Steer clear of this poorly made vacuum pump.
customer_reviews.author: hookedon210s

customer_reviews.title: pump works good, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: pump works good, easy to use... also easy to break threads where oil drain plug screws in. Used a tiny HarborFreight wrench while changing oil, steel bolt shredded aluminum threads on pump like tin. I just used a rubber cork to plug it, still works. Well built...just be careful not to over tighten bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Stronger for sure.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 8 cfm as an upgrade. Though it is much stronger , for some reason i assumed it would be much quieter. I also was hoping to find an external exhaust filter for it (to reduce smoke) and can't seem to find one. but its stronger for sure
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Bad!!!! Stay away!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Dont waste your money. Used it only 5 times and it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is disposable! It only works once! BAD BAD PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: It was bought once and it turned out bad! It was replaced and came back bad! It only works ONCE! That's too much! We feel robbed!
customer_reviews.author: Karoline Rebellon

customer_reviews.title: Best vac pump out there for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vacuum pump for the price. It pulls a near-perfect vacuum as long as it has fresh oil. I would recommend buying a few gallons of pump oil with it, since best results(and longer machine life) will come from changing the oil after every use.
customer_reviews.author: HawaiiHunter

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a very fast pump but it has taken a lot of abuse from me and still kicking
customer_reviews.author: Movement Management

customer_reviews.title: Robinair pump
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum beats any of the other brands, the price is affordable, robinair quality is top notch
customer_reviews.author: Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Best Vac pump out there !!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this beast EIGHT years ago, and it is still kicking, would not be mad at it it fails, knock the wood. I love this machine.Got my money worth and waaaaay more.
customer_reviews.author: H. A. M

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit overkill for my fit ac but will rock for vac bagging.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Decent pump at 8 cfm but uses oil fast
customer_reviews.text: Works okay. But it uses the oil up fast. For almost $300 i expected a little more. I got it for my vacuum chamber for molding. Only takes a couple minutes to hit -29.
customer_reviews.author: EHall754

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed, shoddy build quality
customer_reviews.text: A screw was sheered off on delivery. Looked like a returned unit, or one that was packaged quickly and sloppily. Doesn't seem to pull the vacuum advertised. Have not been impressed with performance of this pump, not much better than its much cheaper smaller brother.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't do better
customer_reviews.text: I've heard other vacuum pumps run, and expected this to be about the same, but it was much quieter than expected. It pulled a full vacuum quickly and I couldn't expect better.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy - it is not durable
customer_reviews.text: I liked it a lot at first, used it just 5 times and the screw housing for the oil drain has somehow worn already. Now the screw won't hold in oil and I can't use it at all. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit loud compared to my smaller pump, ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit loud compared to my smaller pump, even when the 2nd stage kicks in. That's the only downside I see, but it is pushing move power, and I can definitely notice the time it takes to make a full vac
customer_reviews.author: John Green

customer_reviews.title: Broken out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived quickly but when i plugged it in for the first time, it blew the breaker. The motor is locked up from the factory. I will be attempting to contact the manufacturer...
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mackay

customer_reviews.title: Bigger isn't always better
customer_reviews.text: The drain plug strips out. This is the second one in less than a year for this model.it seems to be a problem with the 15800 because we also got 2 15500 models at the same time and have had no issues
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product exceeded my expectations. A little pricey but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tch

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Just not sure how long I actually ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Just not sure how long I actually need to pull the vacuum. it takes it down to -29-30 in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. I'm a hobbyist so this should last ...
customer_reviews.text: A beast of a pump! Pulls down fast and is very quiet. Great quality. I'm a hobbyist so this should last me a lifetime as it won't be used as often as in a revenue shop. Even so, I think it would hold its own if used consistently. A little heavy, just as a note.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing really SUCKS..
customer_reviews.text: This thing really SUCKS......Great pump for the money and a far better buy than any of the pumps from the local heating/ air supply shop.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my holster making business. When my 5cfm finally died I upgraded to this unit. Should have made the switch sooner this is a absolute beast!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This pace of junk only worked for 10 minutes and the pump is overheating
customer_reviews.author: Satellitezoneuk0113

customer_reviews.title: Robinair Vacuum for the win!
customer_reviews.text: Still going strong, able to pull 500microns easily! Highly recommend for 5ton and up units. For split ductless, this is over kill and HEAVY. For those systems, go with a 5-6cfm, you'll be okay! Highly RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Adelbai

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum Pump
customer_reviews.text: I use this for both my AC on vehicles and on a portable milk stand I put together. It pulls a vacuum very fast and if used for milking could easily handle two units if you have a 5 gallon vacuum tank in line.
customer_reviews.author: Rick T

customer_reviews.title: robnair 15800 vacmaster vacuum pump
customer_reviews.text: the vacuum pump was a great choice the price was very good as well as it affordabilty for work i recommend this to anyone who my be looking to purchase a vacuum pump
customer_reviews.author: llerrad notneb

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I've spent twice as much for louder units that draw less vacuum. This is a rock solid unit!
customer_reviews.author: Bill  Zullo

customer_reviews.title: Pump
customer_reviews.text: Pump works very well, be sure to follow directions for use. I would like a better sight glass for oil level.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: For how much we spend on it, let’s make sure it’s shipped with care. Broken parts, take it out and screws falling out that were snapped because it was dropped or put together poorly. Highly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great pump
customer_reviews.text: Use this pump in my AC biz. Pulls vacuum in fraction of the time my old pump. Deep 250 micron vacuum in less than a hour.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Chappell

customer_reviews.title: VERY FAST
customer_reviews.text: THIS VAC IS QUITE FAST AND QUIET. THE COOLING FINS ARE THERE FOR A GOOD REASON, IT HEATS UP QUICKLY. I HAVE USED IT APPROX 20 TIMES SO FAR AND AM VERY PLEASED. SAVE THE RUBBER VENT PLUG FOR STORAGE. IF YOU FORGET TO REMOVE BEFORE USE IT WILL BE LAUNCHED ACROSS THE ROOM AND GIVE YOU SOMETHING TO LOOK FOR WHILE THE PUMP IS RUNNING. ADDENDUM-- AFTER MUCH USE THE RED METAL BASEPLATE IS BENDING FROM THE WEIGHT OF THE PUMP. THIS SEEMS TO BE A WEAK SPOT ON EVERY PUMP I HAVE OWNED REGARDLESS OF BRAND. I WILL MODIFY THE EXISTING PLATE WITH 1"X1" ALUMINUM TUBING. .04C
customer_reviews.author: REEFERMAN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very fast Pump i love it and it is very quiet too
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty darn good, any 4 times better than my 2.5cfm
customer_reviews.author: Steven E Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great sucker, pulls down residential units in about an hour to sub-500 microns.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W Hillman

customer_reviews.title: nice and solid pump
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our HVAC division. It's solid construction and quick. Come with three size connections. Bit heavy but it's worth gold in the field. Can't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: never again shop retail

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Works beautiful. I would definitely recommend this product to others and it is definitely worth the price! Worked excellent for purging.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTE GARBAGE USED 3 TIMES, 3 WEEKS PAST WARRANTY AND POOF SIEZED UP.....BUYER BEWARE OF THIS CHINA CRAP......
customer_reviews.author: michael reilly

customer_reviews.title: excellent for purging BHO
customer_reviews.text: smoky not good for indoors with out venting exhaust. Can't get more than -24 on a 3gal Vac-It. Order extra oil with it if you can.
customer_reviews.author: roger stock

customer_reviews.title: not the same as the one id ordered before :(
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this same pump a few months ago and it has been working fine. I just ordered another one and it acts like a 3 cfm pump!! wont even pull to a full-30hg!! does anyonoe know how to contact robinair directly?
customer_reviews.author: M. Camara

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on a top quality product! Thanks for the quickness. Started right up as soon as i filled it with the included oil.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Bashak

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Product
customer_reviews.text: Product has been purchased before, and works well, but it was damaged during shipping this time.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Geat price for Pump
customer_reviews.text: The first pump I received would no perform to specs, return was based on incomplete as replacement not available for any other reason. Replacement pump performed as should and vacuums were quick and levels reached required for our companies as so few people realize the evacuation of todays refrigeration and a/c system need the compressor shaken to bring the oil saturated with moisture to a higher level where it will release. The price of this special was great, less than the 6 CFM model. Robinair pumps properly maintained perform great the key being maintenance and Robinair oil.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pump for the money pulls 500 microns on a a/c lines 50 ft in less then 10 minutes
customer_reviews.author: William miller

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: Great pump but was dropped in shipping....fan and housing where broken...price was great just disappointing when I needed it it came damaged
customer_reviews.author: Michael Goyette

customer_reviews.title: This pump works great. It Is well built and is able to ...
customer_reviews.text: This pump works great. It Is well built and is able to have 2 vacuum lines on it at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: todd polonski

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing pump!
customer_reviews.text: I was immediately disappointed in speed of evacuation...didn't perform any better than my older single stage pump. I immediately contacted Robinair via their website and never heard back from anyone....I just stopped using it and kept using my old pump...kept meaning to make some more noise with manufacturer but never got around to it. 15 months later my old pump dies so I pull out this Robinair unit (which is super heavy BTW) so here I go again with the disappointments. I've only used it about 8 times... I change oil after every use, use 1/2" vac hose and remove all schraeder valves yet it will not pull down to below 800 microns! NO leaks!...just poor performing pump!
customer_reviews.author: Diana S.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this purchase. I bought it with the intent of using it for DYI CNC vacuum table in my garage. The issue with the vacuum is that the exhaust plug blows out the shortly after turning the system on. This is followed by an oily vapor that quickly renders a closed garage useless. Several others have complained of this issue. Unfortunately for me, the new vac sat on my shelf for the duration of the return period until I was able to install. It's almost new and I'm going to have to try and sell it for quite a loss to someone that accepts it's use for outdoors only.
customer_reviews.author: tmasopust

customer_reviews.title: Really like this product
customer_reviews.text: Received damaged pump, Amazon immediately sent a replacement and new pump does the job I needed it to do. I use it as a vacuum hold down for my CNC machine.
customer_reviews.author: jr.

customer_reviews.title: It cuts the working time to vaccum a system in half
customer_reviews.text: Its a great tool to have. I have recommended to other techs in the area as well as in other states
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pump! I highly recommend it to any HVAC tech.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R

customer_reviews.title: Robinair Vacuum Pump
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this pump but once on my car but it pulled the vacuum down in about 10 minutes.... Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: A/C dude

customer_reviews.title: Runs great!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the highest CFM vacuum pumps, for the lowest price, that I could find. It runs great, and pulls strong vacuum fast. It takes just several minutes to pull about 35 gallons of volume to full vacuum. I have run this pump with my large DIY vacuformer for several hours at a time, in 90+ degree heat - pulling the 35 gallon surge tank to full vacuum, dumping it, and re-pumping it, without shutting the pump off. The pump gets very hot while doing this (~150 degrees). It says it's thermally protected, and the pump has never shut off on me. I've started running a small fan across it just to help with the heat, though.
customer_reviews.author: Guido Kimble

customer_reviews.title: Received a Vacuum Pump that Achieved Insufficient Vacuum and Poor Customer Service from Robinair
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I wasn't impressed by this vacuum pump. After weeks of troubleshooting, emails, and calls, I was not able to achieve a sufficient vacuum in order to degas silicone. I was only able to pull 16 inches of mercury inHg, not the 29 inHg that was needed. Overall, I also wasn't very impressed with the customer service I received from Robinair, and have decided to purchase a comparable, but more expensive vacuum pump by another brand (Yellow Jacket), which also includes accessory options, like an exhaust filter.
customer_reviews.author: K. LeCrone

customer_reviews.title: No Other Brand can match Robinair
customer_reviews.text: The decision to purchase this one is worth every penny. The Robinair 15800 vacuum pump is quite and achived great results after evacuated the system in my 2010 VW Jetta TDi. Word of advice, always change the oil in the vacum pump before servicing any additional vehicle. New oil will prolong the life of the vacum pump, old oil will do the opposite.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: My Husband was THRILLED, Beautiful piece of HVAC equipment !
customer_reviews.text: My Husband was THRILLED, Beautiful piece of HVAC equipment. And it was priced to sell, way below the competetors prices !!!
customer_reviews.author: BrandyG

customer_reviews.title: IT'S SO HEAVY 40 LB
customer_reviews.text: IT'S A REALLY GOOD ONE-NO COMPLAIN-BUT IT'S SO HEAVY 40LB TO BRING IT ON ROOF FOR MY JOB. IT'S FOR A BIG GUY
customer_reviews.author: HANH LE RICHMOND VA

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: no complaints. does the job. this is my 3rd one i ordered and the quietest pump i have owned . i would recommend this
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: a good pump
customer_reviews.text: it works good at drawing a quick, deep vacume with the reputation and quality of robinair products...Robinair has always given me great service with a great product
customer_reviews.author: jerry cannon

customer_reviews.title: This is the second one shipped to me. The ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one shipped to me. The first did not work at all. This one worked but the oil drain plug leaks profusely, limiting its use.
customer_reviews.author: BDV

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum pump for the price...
customer_reviews.text: It was deeply discounted or on sale when I ordered. This is twice the CFM of the one I sold and it cost me less than I got for the old one in average used condition. It appears lighter and smaller than most pumps that can move 6-10 CFM. Well made with good finish and good shipping container. I store mine in the original shipping container so that it does not get banged up in the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Hobbyist

customer_reviews.title: Wise purchase
customer_reviews.text: This pump was recommended by a professional and it worked exactly as expected, quite well. It was priced reasonably and I'm satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 1 in nov 2013 had to have it ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 1 in nov 2013 had to have it replaced. the replacement stoped working july 1 st I would not rcommened it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN W PETERSON

customer_reviews.title: Robinair 15800 8cfm
customer_reviews.text: The price was good the machine works great, instructions and start up was good, the providing of the oil was what should be for a quality purchase and the DLVR was perfect
customer_reviews.author: floyd milligan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended run DIY or a mechanic and uses it for his job
customer_reviews.text: The only problem with leaving a good review with you create any man or the product which in turn if you want another one it may not be there but I have to say is an excellent Ronna bring to remove the seller was very careful to package it well my product wouldn't get damaged and I'm just a do-it-yourselfer mechanic on my own vehicles and I needed something for all of my cars that are older to vacuum down the system and I have to to say this is more than sufficient for what I need
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: USED!
customer_reviews.text: Pump was clearly USED when I ordered a NEW product! I recorded the unboxing and was disappointed to find that there was THICK, DARK oil in the chamber! Not only that, but it doesn't even pull full vac! Really just want what I paid for- a NEW Vacuum Pump!
customer_reviews.author: Jiji Tringale

customer_reviews.title: Wroked OK!
customer_reviews.text: Pulled vaccum very quickly, I just was not sure the vaccum indicated was correct or not, could have been my gauges but just not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Just an old Texan!

customer_reviews.title: do not like the pump i have used it 4 times and ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: bought pump 10 months ago pump quit so the pump lasted 10 months you decide if that is good or bad
customer_reviews.author: ray evans

customer_reviews.title: fast,reliable,durable and affordable vacuum machine
customer_reviews.text: I have been in the HVAC business for about 3 years now and this vacuum pump is not only the fastest I have seen but also the most reliable and affordable. My boss has been doing HVAC for about 40 years out of which he has owned his own business for 27. My boss had been using a 6 CFM Yellow Jacket vacuum pump for which he paid around $400. His Yellow Jacket pump was not only expensive but slow to put a system in a vacuum. Today my boss owns his own Robinair VacuMaster pump and realizes that Robinair produts are not only more affordable, reliable, and durable than Yellow Jacket's.
customer_reviews.author: Otrevor Alavaz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great tool for the professional. The shipping was very fast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Called tech support and they could not care ...
customer_reviews.text: First item came damaged. Ordered replacement, then on/off switch did not work. Very disappointed. Called tech support and they could not care less. They only said send it back. Will never own another Robinair product.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Craven

customer_reviews.title: AMAZON'S GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Robinair 15800 Vacuum pump Brand new . It was DOA , I followed Amazons instructions for returning the pump. They returned the pump and sent me out a new one RIGHT AWAY. It works great and good value for the money . Although there was the hassle in getting a pump that did not work and having to go through returning it,(these things happen). Amazon's well thought out return system kept My Stress Factor to a minimum. I Thank Amazon for a great customer service experience even under these circumstances!
customer_reviews.author: WOLFY

product_meta.title: Robinair 15800 VacuMaster Economy Vacuum Pump - 2-Stage, 8 CFM, CHROME
product_meta.description: Robinair's 15800 VacuMaster Economy Vacuum Pump is a high performance, heavy duty 2-Stage rotary vane design vacuum pump designed for commercial refrigeration use. With an 8 CFM free air displacement, factory rating to 40 microns, and 18.6 ounce oil reservoir, this unit has the capacity you need to get the job done. This robust unit features a 1 HP, 115V, 60 Hz thermally protected motor; an inlet fitting engineered for maximum airflow while preventing oil backflow; finned aluminum surfaces that dissipate heat faster (keeping pump cooler and extending life); 1/4" & 3/8" MFL inlet fittings; easy to read sight glass; easy access oil fill port; oil drain valve positioned at the bottom of the oil reservoir and angled for faster, more complete draining, and non-skid feet. Oil included. Robinair, a Bosch Automotive Service Solutions brand, is a global leader in service tools and equipment based in Owatonna, Minnesota. Robinair is recognized throughout the world as the quality and performance leader in AC/R evacuation tools and this position has led to its success with the full range of products that serve the heating/ventilating/air conditioning/refrigeration (HVAC-R) and mobile markets, which includes the automotive aftermarket along with other industries such as agriculture and construction.
feature_bullets: Robinair's VacuMaster Economy Vacuum Pump is designed for commercial refrigeration use and features a 2-Stage rotary vane design, 18.6 ounce oil capacity, and non-skid feet
8 CFM free air displacement; factory rated to 40 microns

Features an inlet fitting engineered for maximum airflow while preventing oil backflow, and finned aluminum surfaces that dissipate heat faster, keeping pump cooler and extending life.Cord length:72 inch
1/4 & 3/8 inch MFL inlet fittings, easy to read sight glass, easy access oil fill port, and oil drain valve positioned at the bottom of the oil reservoir and angled for faster, more complete draining
